title: Opening!
text:
The Users Group is instantiated





An important milestone


On Feb. 5th, 2025, Giuseppe Espa, Maria Michela Dickson, Flavio Santi, Diego Giuliani and Paolo Bosetti had the first ffounding meeting of the R-Trento Users Group.

RTUG <- list("Giuseppe", "Maria Michela", "Flavio", "Diego", "Paolo")

That’s a milestone.

title: R-Trento Users Group (RTUG)
text:
The R-Trento Users Group is a shared space for academics, scholars, students, and professionals living and working in Trentino and surrounding areas that are passionate about the R language and its suite of tools.

Mission
RTUG mission is to spread the use or R language and tools within academia, industry and public administration.
